curam.util.administration.intf

Interface CodeTableAdmin

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    curam.util.administration.base.CodeTableAdmin, CodeTableAdmin, CodeTableAdminFactory

    public interface CodeTableAdmin
    CodeTableAdmin provides accessor methods for the code tables on the database. This BPO does not use the code table cache and as such should typically not be used in runtime code.
    See Also:
    CodeTable

    • Method Detail

      • addCodeTable

        void addCodeTable(java.lang.String tableName,
                  java.lang.String defaultCode,
                  java.lang.String codetableItemTabList)
           throws AppException,
                  InformationalException
        Add a new table, including the list of codes, descriptions and annotations belonging to that table to the database. This method will also assign a code to be the default code for that table. Should a list of codes be provided, the defaultCode must either be empty or one of the elements in the list.
        Parameters:
        tableName - The table to be added
        defaultCode - The default code for that table
        codetableItemTabList - A tab delimited string consisting of of tuples of code, description, annotation, sort order and locale code.
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_SETDEFAULTCODE_ITEMNOTFOUND - if the default code is not on this table.
        AppException - ID_CODETABLEADMIN_CODE_EMPTY - if an item has an empty code field.
        AppException - ID_CODETABLEADMIN_DESCRIPTION_EMPTY - if an item has an empty description field.
        AppException - ID_ADDCODETABLE_ITEMDUPREC - if a code table item is not unique.
        AppException - ID_ADDCODETABLE_DESCRIPTIONDUPREC - if a code table description is not unique.
        AppRuntimeException - RUN_ID_CODETABLEADMIN_UNEXPECTED_END_OF_ITEM - if the list of CodeTable items could not be parsed because it ended unexpectedly while parsing an item.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • deleteCodeTable

        void deleteCodeTable(java.lang.String tableName)
              throws AppException,
                     InformationalException
        Delete the specified code table.
        Parameters:
        tableName - The table to be deleted.
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_DELCODETABLE_NOTFOUND - if the Code Table to delete cannot be found.
        AppException - ID_DELCODETABLE_HIERARCHY - if the Code Table is in a hierarchy.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • changeTableName

        void changeTableName(java.lang.String currentTableName,
                     java.lang.String newTableName,
                     int versionNo)
              throws AppException,
                     InformationalException
        Change the name of an existing code table. If it is part of a hierarchy, the child codetable will be updated.
        Parameters:
        currentTableName - The name of the existing code table.
        newTableName - The new name for the table.
        versionNo - The version number of the entry (used by the optimistic locking mechanism).
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_CHANGETABLENAME_NOTFOUND - if the table to be changed could not be found.
        AppException - ID_CHANGETABLENAME_DUPREC - if a table with this name already exists.
        AppException - ID_RECORD_CHANGED - if the target record has been modified.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • listAllTables

        CodeTableAdminListAllTablesOut listAllTables()
                                      throws AppException,
                                             InformationalException
        Return details about all the code tables in the system. The list returned is empty if there are no code tables.
        Returns:
        A list of tuples of code table name, default code and timestamp.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        AppException - Generated database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • setTableDefaultCode

        void setTableDefaultCode(java.lang.String tableName,
                         java.lang.String newDefaultCode,
                         int versionNo)
                  throws AppException,
                         InformationalException
        Set the default code for a table.
        Parameters:
        tableName - The name of the table whose default code should be changed.
        newDefaultCode - The new default code for the table.
        versionNo - The version number of the entry (used by the optimistic locking mechanism).
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_SETDEFAULTCODE_TABLENOTFOUND - if the default code for the table could not be set because the table could not be found.
        AppException - ID_SETDEFAULTCODE_ITEMNOTFOUND - if the default code for the table could not be set because the code is not on this table.
        AppException - ID_RECORD_CHANGED - if the target record has been modified.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • addItem

        void addItem(CodeTableItemDetails dtls)
      throws AppException,
             InformationalException
        Add a new code table item to the specified code table. This does not add a parent code value to the item. To add a parent code, you must use the modifyParentCode() method.
        Parameters:
        dtls - The details of the item to be added, which includes the table which should be updated, the new code, description, annotation, isEnabled flag, sort order and locale code.
        Throws:
        AppException - curam.util.message.INFRASTRUCTURE#ID_ADDITEM_NOTABLE ID_ADDITEM_NOTABLE } - if the code table to be updated does not exist.
        AppException - ID_ADDITEM_DUPREC - if the item to add already exists on this table.
        AppException - ID_ADDITEM_DESCRIPTION_EMPTY - if the item to add has no description.
        AppException - ID_ADDITEM_DESCRIPTIONDUPREC - if the description already exists in the code table and both entries are enabled.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • deleteItem

        void deleteItem(CodeTableItemUniqueKey itemKey)
         throws AppException,
                InformationalException
        Delete a code from the specified code table. The default code is set to empty if this code was the default code.
        Parameters:
        itemKey - The name of the table and the code which should be deleted from it.
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_NO_SUCH_TABLE - if there is no such code table.
        AppException - ID_DELITEM_NOTFOUND - if the item to delete does not exist in the code table.
        AppException - ID_DELITEM_LINKED - if the item to delete is linked to other items.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • addEmptyCodeTable

        void addEmptyCodeTable(java.lang.String tableName,
                       java.lang.String defaultCode)
                throws AppException,
                       InformationalException
        Add an empty code table.
        Parameters:
        tableName - The name of the table to be added.
        defaultCode - The default code for this table.
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_ADDEMPTYCODETABLE_DUPREC - if a code table with this name already exists.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • parseItemList

        CodeTableAdminListAllItemsOut parseItemList(java.lang.String dataString)
                                     throws AppException,
                                            InformationalException
        Parse a tab delimited string consisting of tuples of codes, descriptions, annotations, isEnabled flags, sort orders and locale codes.
        Parameters:
        dataString - A tab delimited string consisting of tuples of codes, descriptions, annotations, sort orders and language codes.
        Returns:
        A data structure containing the parsed codes, descriptions, annotations sort orders and language codes.
        Throws:
        AppRuntimeException - RUN_ID_CODETABLEADMIN_UNEXPECTED_END_OF_ITEM - if the list of CodeTable items could not be parsed because it ended unexpectedly while parsing an item.
        AppException
        InformationalException

      • changeItem

        void changeItem(CodeTableItemUniqueKey itemKey,
                CodeTableItemDetails dtls)
         throws AppException,
                InformationalException
        Change the code, description, annotation, isEnabled flag, sort order and locale code of an existing code table item. If the code changes and is linked in a hierarchy, its children codes will be updated as well. This method does not allow you to change the parent code. To change the parent code, you must call the modifyParentCode() method.
        Parameters:
        itemKey - The name of the code table item and the table on which it resides.
        dtls - The new code,description and annotation.
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_CHANGEITEM_RECNOTFOUND - if the item to change cannot be found.
        AppException - ID_CHANGEITEM_TABLENOTFOUND - if the table which contains the item cannot be found.
        AppException - ID_CODETABLEADMIN_CHANGE_ITEM_CODE_EMPTY - if the specified new item code is empty.
        AppException - ID_CODETABLEADMIN_CHANGE_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_EMPTY - if the new item does not have a description.
        AppException - ID_CHANGEITEM_DUPREC - if the item could not be changed because an item with this name already exists on the table.
        AppException - ID_CHANGEITEM_DESCRIPTIONDUPREC - if the item could not be changed because an enabled item with this description already exists on the table and the item to be changed is also enabled.
        AppException - ID_CODETABLEADMIN_TABLE_NAME_EMPTY - if the item could not be changed because the table name is empty.
        AppException - ID_RECORD_CHANGED - if the target record has been modified.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • listAllItems

        CodeTableAdminListAllItemsAndDefaultOut listAllItems(java.lang.String tableName)
                                              throws AppException,
                                                     InformationalException
        List both enabled and disabled item codes, descriptions and annotations for a specific code table, along with its default code. The List is ordered and can be sorted by "sort order" attribute of the codetable. If there are no codes then the list is empty.
        Parameters:
        tableName - The code table whose details are to be returned.
        Returns:
        An ordered list containing the code, description and annotation for all the codes in the specified table accompanied with the default code for that table.
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_LISTALLITEMS_TABLENOTFOUND - if the table could not be found.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • readCodeTableItemDetails

        CodeTableItemDetails readCodeTableItemDetails(CodeTableItemUniqueKey key)
                                       throws AppException,
                                              InformationalException
        Get the details of a code table item. This includes annotation, code, description, an enabled flag, table name, locale, sort order and version number.
        Parameters:
        key - The name of the code table item, the table on which it resides and the locale.
        Returns:
        The details of the code table item, including the table name, the code, description, annotation, isEnabled flag, sort order, locale code and versionNo.
        Throws:
        AppException - INFRASTRUCTURE.ID_READ_CODETABLEITEM_NOTFOUND - if the item cannot be found.
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • modifyChildCode

        void modifyChildCode(CodeTableItemUniqueKey key,
                     java.lang.String childCode)
              throws AppException,
                     InformationalException
        Add or remove a link to a child code. If the link already existed, it will be removed, otherwise it will be added.
        Parameters:
        key - The code table name and code.
        childCode - The child code.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        AppException - INFRASTRUCTURE.ID_READ_CODETABLEITEM_NOTFOUND - if the code table item cannot be found.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • readCTIDetailsForLocaleOrLanguage

        CodeTableItemDetails readCTIDetailsForLocaleOrLanguage(CodeTableItemUniqueKey key)
                                                throws AppException,
                                                       InformationalException
        Get the code table item details based on unique key consisting of code, tableName and locale. If no code table item is found for the specified locale, then use the language part to find the code table item.
        Throws:
        AppException
        InformationalException

      • listChildrenCodesForLocaleAndLanguage

        CodeTableItemDetailsList listChildrenCodesForLocaleAndLanguage(CodeTableItemUniqueKey key)
                                                        throws AppException,
                                                               InformationalException
        Return a list of children codes for the specified code. This method uses the locale passed in. If the locale consists of a language and country part, then this method searches using the language and country part and also using just the language part, ensuring only unique children codes are returned. If nothing is found for the locale passed in, then the default locale of en will be used to find an item.
        Parameters:
        key - The code table item key.
        Returns:
        List of codetable item details.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        AppException - INFRASTRUCTURE.ID_READ_CODETABLEITEM_NOTFOUND - if the item cannot be found.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • listAllItemsForLocaleAndLanguage

        CodeTableItemDetailsList listAllItemsForLocaleAndLanguage(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                          java.lang.String locale)
                                                   throws AppException,
                                                          InformationalException
        Return a list of codes contained in a code table for a particular locale and its language part with no duplicates.
        Throws:
        AppException
        InformationalException

      • listUnlinkedCodesForLocaleAndLanguage

        CodeTableItemDetailsList listUnlinkedCodesForLocaleAndLanguage(java.lang.String locale,
                                                               java.lang.String tableName)
                                                        throws AppException,
                                                               InformationalException
        Return a list of code table items that have no parent code for the specified locale and its language part.
        Throws:
        AppException
        InformationalException

      • addItemWithComment

        void addItemWithComment(CodeTableItemWithCommentDetails dtls)
                 throws AppException,
                        InformationalException
        Add a new code table item along with comment, to the specified code table. This does not add a parent code value to the item. To add a parent code, you must use the modifyParentCode() method.
        Parameters:
        dtls - The details of the item to be added, which includes the table which should be updated, the new code, description, annotation, isEnabled flag, sort order, locale code and comment.
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_ADDITEM_NOTABLE - if the code table to be updated does not exist.
        AppException - ID_ADDITEM_DUPREC - if the item to add already exists on this table.
        AppException - ID_ADDITEM_DESCRIPTION_EMPTY - if the item to add has no description.
        AppException - ID_ADDITEM_DESCRIPTIONDUPREC - if the description already exists in the code table and both entries are enabled.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • addCodeTableData

        void addCodeTableData(CodeTableDataDetails dtls)
               throws AppException,
                      InformationalException
        Add a new code table data record. The CODETABLEDATA entity contains the table name, locale identifier and the comments field. This entity is used to store comments for the code table header. This method will allow adding comments for multiple locales for a code table header data.
        Parameters:
        dtls - The details of the code table data to be added, which includes the table name associated with the code table, locale code and comment.
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_ADDCODETABLEDATA_TABLE_NAME_EMPTY - if a code table name is empty.
        AppException - ID_ADDCODETABLEDATA_LOCALE_EMPTY - if the localeIdentifier is empty.
        AppException - ID_ADDCODETABLEDATA_DUPREC - if a code table header data is not unique.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • changeItemWithComment

        void changeItemWithComment(CodeTableItemUniqueKey itemKey,
                           CodeTableItemWithCommentDetails dtls)
                    throws AppException,
                           InformationalException
        Change the code, description, annotation, isEnabled flag, sort order, locale code and comment of an existing code table item. If the code changes and is linked in a hierarchy, its children codes will be updated as well. This method does not allow you to change the parent code. To change the parent code, you must call the modifyParentCode() method.
        Parameters:
        itemKey - The name of the code table item and the table on which it resides.
        dtls - The new code,description,annotation and comment.
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_CHANGEITEM_RECNOTFOUND - if the item to change cannot be found.
        AppException - ID_CHANGEITEM_TABLENOTFOUND - if the table which contains the item cannot be found.
        AppException - ID_CODETABLEADMIN_CHANGE_ITEM_CODE_EMPTY - if the specified new item code is empty.
        AppException - ID_CODETABLEADMIN_CHANGE_ITEM_DESCRIPTION_EMPTY - if the new item does not have a description.
        AppException - ID_CHANGEITEM_DUPREC - if the item could not be changed because an item with this name already exists on the table.
        AppException - ID_CHANGEITEM_DESCRIPTIONDUPREC - if the item could not be changed because an enabled item with this description already exists on the table and the item to be changed is also enabled.
        AppException - ID_CODETABLEADMIN_TABLE_NAME_EMPTY - if the item could not be changed because the table name is empty.
        AppException - ID_RECORD_CHANGED - if the target record has been modified.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • changeCodeTableData

        void changeCodeTableData(CodeTableDataUniqueKey hederDataKey,
                         CodeTableDataDetails dtls)
                  throws AppException,
                         InformationalException
        Modify the code table data record. The CODETABLEDATA entity contains the table name, locale identifier and the comments field. This entity is used to store comments for the code table header. This method will allow modifying comments for multiple locales for a code table header data.
        Parameters:
        hederDataKey - The key to store name of the code table and the locale.
        dtls - The details of the code table data to be modified, which includes the table name associated with the code table, locale code, versionNo and comment.
        Throws:
        AppException - ID_MODIFYCODETABLEDATA_TABLE_NAME_EMPTY - if a code table name is empty.
        AppException - ID_MODIFYCODETABLEDATA_LOCALE_EMPTY - if the localeIdentifier is empty.
        AppException - ID_MODIFYCODETABLEDATA_DUPREC - if a code table header data is not unique.
        AppException - ID_CHANGETABLEDATA_RECNOTFOUND - if the record to changed cannot be found.
        AppException - ID_RECORD_CHANGED - if the record has been changed by another user.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • searchByCodeTableName

        CTNameStampDefaultCodeList searchByCodeTableName(java.lang.String tableName)
                                          throws AppException,
                                                 InformationalException
        This method takes in the code table name as a parameter and searches for all code table records where the table name fully or partially matches the table name passed in. The table name passed in may be a full or partial code table name. This search is case insensitive. The first series of characters of the table name passed in must match the first series of characters of the code table record that exists. For example, if 'Se' is passed in, then this method will search for all code tables where the table name starts with the characters 'Se', ignoring the case. The results are returned in alphabetical order sorted by code table name.
        Parameters:
        tableName - The full or partial table name of the code table record.
        Returns:
        The list of code table details that match the code table name passed in. These details include: tableName, defaultCode and timeEntered.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception
        InformationalException - Generic Exception.

      • searchByCodeTableDisplayName

        CTNameDisplayNameDetailsList searchByCodeTableDisplayName(java.lang.String tableName)
                                                   throws AppException,
                                                          InformationalException
        This method takes in the code table name as a parameter and searches for all code table records where the table name fully or partially matches the table name passed in. The table name passed in may be a full or partial code table name. This search is case insensitive. The first series of characters of the table name passed in must match the first series of characters of the code table record that exists. For example, if 'Se' is passed in, then this method will search for all code tables where the table name starts with the characters 'Se', ignoring the case. The results are returned in alphabetical order sorted by code table name.
        Parameters:
        tableName - The full or partial table name of the code table record. record.
        Returns:
        The list of code table details that match the code table name passed in. These details include: tableName, defaultCode and timeEntered.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception
        InformationalException - Generic Exception.

        This method takes in the code table name as a parameter and searches for all code table records where the table name fully or partially matches the table name passed in. The first series of characters of the table name passed in must match the first series of characters of the code table record that exists. For example, if 'Se' is passed in, then this method will search for all code tables where the table name starts with the characters 'Se', ignoring the case. The results are returned in alphabetical order sorted by code table name.
        Parameters:
        arg1 - The full or partial table name of the code table record.
        arg2 - The full or partial table name of the code table record.
        Returns:
        The list of code table details that match the code table name passed in. These details include: tableName, defaultCode and timeEntered.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception

                                                              InformationalException
        Retrieves all codetable tablename with their display names. The displaynames will be in the current user's locale The local can be major or minor locale. example a minor locale is 'en_US' and major locale is 'en'. If no displayname found, it will return the tablename.

        CTDisplayNameDetailsList list of codetable displaynames.
        Throws:
        AppException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • listChildrenCodesWithDisplayNameForLocale

        CodeTableItemAndDisplayDtlsList listChildrenCodesWithDisplayNameForLocale(CodeTableItemUniqueKey arg1)
                                                                   throws AppException,
                                                                          InformationalException
        Return a list of children codes for the specified code, including the display name for the child codetable for the locale. If no display name exists for the locale the fallback locale is used. If no display name exists for the fallback locale, the table name is used. For finding the child items, if the locale consists of a language and country part, then this method searches using the language and country part and also using just the language part, ensuring only unique children codes are returned. If nothing is found for the locale passed in, then the default locale of en will be used to find an item.
        Parameters:
        arg1 - The code table item key.
        Returns:
        List of codetable item details, including display name for the codetable.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        AppException - INFRASTRUCTURE.ID_READ_CODETABLEITEM_NOTFOUND - if the item cannot be found.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.

      • listCodeTablesExcludeTablesInHierarchy

        CodeTableAdminListAllTablesOut listCodeTablesExcludeTablesInHierarchy()
                                                               throws AppException,
                                                                      InformationalException
        Return details about all the code tables in the system but excludes all code tables that are part of a code table hierarchy. The list returned is empty if there are no code tables.
        Returns:
        A list of tuples of code table name, default code and timestamp.
        Throws:
        DatabaseException - Standard database exceptions.
        AppException - Generated database exceptions.
        InformationalException - Generic Exception Signature.
